bibl.title: Letter from T.H.D. Griffitts to Henry Rose Carter, August 19, 1925

div1.p: Griffitts discusses his new job and expresses admiration for Carter as a friend and mentor.

div1.head: Letter from T.H.D. Griffitts to Henry Rose Carter, August 19, 1925

opener.dateline:
ALABAMA POWER COMPANY
BIRMINGHAM, ALABAMA.
Aug. 19, 1925.

div1.p:
I have had so much to do starting
on the new job that days have passed
like hours, but I have hopes that I
will be able to do some of the big
things you have long been devoting
your best energies to advance.

Just last night, as has been the case
many, many times before, I was mentally
reviewing your great life work. No
man of the medical profession the
world over has applied so keen, so
analytic, so judicial a mind to
preventive medicine, and with the
far reaching practical effect, as have
you. In saying this nothing is taken
from Gorgas, as an executive sanitarian,
no aspersion is cast upon Read, Carroll
& Agramonte; no laurels from Ross,
Koch and Pasteur, for all in their
field achieved greatness. But, of all,
yours has been without the glare
ALABAMA POWER COMPANY
BIRMINGHAM, ALABAMA.
of trumpets and the evanescent heroism
of the banquet table. You builded
the foundation and erected the defenses
against yellow fever, and lived to
see the day when this scourge was
practically pushed off the face of the
earth. Malaria will be slower, but
you have set the pace in muddy
boots to “see with your own eyes”
the things that must ultimately remove
malaria from the land you love.
If you had done nothing else
but that which has been accomplished
through the “Malaria Catechism” in
the public schools of the South, you
certainly would have merited “Well
Done, Thou Good and Faithful
Servent.” In the past uninhabited
swamps and ponded countries of
the Carolinas, Virginia, Georgia
Louisiana, Alabama, Arkansas
ALABAMA POWER COMPANY
BIRMINGHAM, ALABAMA.
Tennessee and Texas, I can see
a “Carter's Public School” where
a full Americanism as exemplified
more typically by you and your
unstinted, unselfish life, shall be
taught.

The kiddies join me in the
warmest love.
